items.sentence: Tom said he didn\'t have anything to write with.
Tom said that he couldn\'t understand my French.
Tom says he doesn\'t want to do that by himself.
Tom says he isn\'t in the mood to do that today.
Why haven\'t you been showing up to work lately?
A man with a full belly thinks no one is hungry.
Couldn\'t you have told me about that yesterday?
Tom is just one of the kids in our neighborhood.
My father says he\'s planning to buy me a horse.
My first French teacher\'s name was Tom Jackson.
